sources.title: Across The Hall | Full Movie | Mystery Thriller | Brittany Murphy
sources.description:
Across The Hall - One quiet night, Julian receives a frantic phone call from his best friend, Terry, who says he followed his unfaithful fiancÃ©, June, to a seedy hotel. He's staked out the room across the hall from her, a bottle of whiskey in one hand and a revolver in the other. Julian must do everything he can to keep his friend talking while he rushes to avert disaster.
2099.  Stars: Mike Vogel, Danny Pino, Brittany Murphy
*Licensed from Voltage Pictures. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: The unbalanced Terry calls his best friend Julian that is having a bath telling that his beloved fiancÃ©e June is cheating him. Terry has followed her to the decadent Riverview Hotel, where she checked in to meet her lover in room 507. Terry explains to Julian that he brought a revolver to shoot her lover and is waiting for him in room 508, but his friend asks him to be calm that he will meet Terry in the hotel.
metadata.Writer: Alex Merkin, Jesse Mittelstadt, Julien Schwab
metadata.Actors: Mike Vogel, Danny Pino, Brittany Murphy
